descr.p: Most of the functionality is found in types and classes defined in the implementation section, and accessed by calling the Run_Ins function. Multithreading should be possible.
An error log is written to the ttinterp.log file when enabled.

ul.li: Lots and lots of changes: This version is not re-entrant, but much faster.

element.name: Run_Ins
element.short: Runs the TrueType bytecode interpreter with the code range and IP in the execution context.
element.descr: Used in the implementation of routines in the TTObjs.pas unit.

element.name: Run_Ins.Result
element.short: TError return value from the TInterpreter class instance in the routine.

element.name: Run_Ins.AErrorLog
element.short: True enables error logging in the routine.
